summary: The document is an Indenture dated November 17, 2025, between Mattel, Inc. and U.S. Bank Trust Company, National Association, outlining the terms for issuing securities. It includes definitions, details on the securities, redemption, covenants, defaults, trustee duties, satisfaction and discharge, amendments, and miscellaneous provisions. The Indenture also reconciles with the Trust Indenture Act of 1939.
